attributes.action: Get rid of all plastic straws to help the environment
attributes.additional_details: Even if getting rid of plastic straws ,is are starter to a safer environment then am all for it. Then perhaps in the furture we could of proguessed into more bans against plastic materials.
attributes.background: Straws are destroying are environment their hard to decompose. Plastic in general is one of main objects that destroys are environment how many times have you seen a plastic bottles, plastic bags scattered on pavements/passages. This is unsafe to the environment we need to be more eco friendly.
